cause.description:
The media is only giving one side of what's happening in Darfur. Men and women from the United States State Department have been going to Nigeria for a long time, trying to work out a treaty. Something's being done--support the men and women risking their lives to be over there to help these people.
1. The media isn't telling the whole story
2. Darfur is a civil war--not a genocide
3. Support the international groups helping
cause.mission: spread the truth about what's happening in Darfur.
cause.name: Truth About Darfur
